lead_paragraph: South Korea’s Red Cross offered the North an estimated $8.3 million in aid to help cope with flooding, Yonhap news agency reported on Tuesday.
snippet: South Korea’s Red Cross offered the North an estimated $8.3 million in aid to help cope with flooding, Yonhap news agency reported on Tuesday.

headline.main: South Korean Red Cross Offers Flood Aid to North
headline.print_headline: South Korean Red Cross Offers Flood Aid to North
